description.zh-cn: 原重庆市司法局局长、重庆市公安局常务副局长，中国第一个被执行死刑的正厅局级公安局长。
description.en: Former Director of Chongqing Municipal Bureau of Justice and Executive Deputy Director of Chongqing Municipal Public Security Bureau. He was the first public security bureau chief at the prefectural level to be executed in China.

description.zh-cn: 文强的出生地，现为重庆市巴南区。
description.en: Wen Qiang's birthplace, now Banan District, Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 重庆市人民政府下设的负责全市公共安全工作的职能部门，文强曾在此长期担任领导职务。
description.en: The functional department of the Chongqing Municipal People's Government responsible for public security work throughout the city, where Wen Qiang held a long-term leadership position.

description.zh-cn: 重庆市人民政府下设的负责全市司法行政工作的职能部门，文强案发前担任局长。
description.en: The functional department of the Chongqing Municipal People's Government responsible for judicial administration work throughout the city. Wen Qiang served as its director before his case.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国人民警察警衔中的高级警衔，文强曾持有该警衔。
description.en: A high-ranking police rank in the People's Police of the People's Republic of China, formerly held by Wen Qiang.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 文强早期任职的公安机关。
description.en: The public security bureau where Wen Qiang served in his early career.

en: Ba County Political and Legal Affairs Commission

description.zh-cn: 文强早期任职的政法机关。
description.en: The political and legal affairs commission where Wen Qiang served in his early career.

description.zh-cn: 文强早期任职的党委机关。
description.en: The Party committee where Wen Qiang served in his early career.

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆的一名系列抢劫杀人案罪犯，其案件由时任重庆市公安局副局长的文强负责侦破。
description.en: A serial robber and murderer from mainland China, whose case was solved under the responsibility of Wen Qiang, who was then the Deputy Director of the Chongqing Municipal Public Security Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 曾任重庆市公安局局长，是文强的上司。
description.en: Former Director of Chongqing Municipal Public Security Bureau and Wen Qiang's superior.

description.zh-cn: 曾任重庆市公安局局长，是文强的上司。
description.en: Former Director of Chongqing Municipal Public Security Bureau and Wen Qiang's superior.

description.zh-cn: 曾任重庆市公安局局长，是文强的上司。
description.en: Former Director of Chongqing Municipal Public Security Bureau and Wen Qiang's superior.

description.zh-cn: 曾任重庆市公安局局长，是文强的上司。
description.en: Former Director of Chongqing Municipal Public Security Bureau and Wen Qiang's superior.

description.zh-cn: 原重庆市公安局副局长，与文强一同被逮捕。
description.en: Former Deputy Director of Chongqing Municipal Public Security Bureau, arrested along with Wen Qiang.

description.zh-cn: 文强弟弟文兵的妻子，因涉黑被判刑。
description.en: Wife of Wen Qiang's younger brother Wen Bing, sentenced for involvement in organized crime.

nodes.id: 重庆市第五中级人民法院

zh-cn: 重庆市第五中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 负责文强案一审的法院。
description.en: The court responsible for the first-instance trial of Wen Qiang's case.

description.zh-cn: 文强的妻子，同案受审。
description.en: Wen Qiang's wife, who was tried in the same case.

description.zh-cn: 原重庆市公安局刑警总队副总队长，文强的下属，同案受审。
description.en: Former Deputy Chief of the Criminal Investigation Corps of Chongqing Municipal Public Security Bureau, Wen Qiang's subordinate, tried in the same case.

description.zh-cn: 原重庆市公安局经侦总队副总队长，文强的下属，同案受审。
description.en: Former Deputy Chief of the Economic Crime Investigation Corps of Chongqing Municipal Public Security Bureau, Wen Qiang's subordinate, tried in the same case.

description.zh-cn: 原重庆市公安局治安总队副总队长，文强的下属，同案受审。
description.en: Former Deputy Chief of the Public Order Corps of Chongqing Municipal Public Security Bureau, Wen Qiang's subordinate, tried in the same case.

description.zh-cn: 负责文强案二审的法院。
description.en: The court responsible for the second-instance trial of Wen Qiang's case.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院
en: Supreme People's Court of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高审判机关，负责文强死刑的核准。
description.en: The highest judicial organ in the People's Republic of China, responsible for reviewing and approving Wen Qiang's death sentence.

nodes.id: 重庆打黑除恶专项行动

zh-cn: 重庆打黑除恶专项行动

description.zh-cn: 2009年至2012年间在重庆市开展的大规模打击有组织犯罪的行动，文强案是其中的一个标志性案件。
description.en: A large-scale campaign against organized crime conducted in Chongqing from 2009 to 2012, in which the Wen Qiang case was a landmark event.

description.zh-cn: 公安机关中负责刑事案件侦查的警务人员职位。
description.en: A police officer position within public security organs responsible for investigating criminal cases.

position.zh-cn: 副局长、常务副局长、党委副书记
position.en: Deputy Director, Executive Deputy Director, Deputy Party Secretary

description.zh-cn: 文强在担任重庆市公安局副局长任上，负责侦破并成功抓获了张君及其犯罪团伙。
description.en: While serving as the Deputy Director of the Chongqing Municipal Public Security Bureau, Wen Qiang was responsible for investigating and successfully apprehending Zhang Jun and his criminal gang.

description.zh-cn: 在郭元立担任重庆市公安局局长期间，文强是其下属副局长。
description.en: During Guo Yuanli's tenure as Director of the Chongqing Municipal Public Security Bureau, Wen Qiang was his subordinate Deputy Director.

description.zh-cn: 在陈邦国担任重庆市公安局局长期间，文强是其下属副局长。
description.en: During Chen Bangguo's tenure as Director of the Chongqing Municipal Public Security Bureau, Wen Qiang was his subordinate Deputy Director.

description.zh-cn: 在朱明国担任重庆市公安局局长期间，文强是其下属副局长、常务副局长。
description.en: During Zhu Mingguo's tenure as Director of the Chongqing Municipal Public Security Bureau, Wen Qiang was his subordinate Deputy Director and Executive Deputy Director.

description.zh-cn: 在刘光磊担任重庆市公安局局长期间，文强是其下属常务副局长。
description.en: During Liu Guanglei's tenure as Director of the Chongqing Municipal Public Security Bureau, Wen Qiang was his subordinate Executive Deputy Director.

relationships.source: 重庆打黑除恶专项行动

description.zh-cn: 文强在重庆打黑除恶专项行动中案发并被查处。
description.en: Wen Qiang's case was exposed and he was investigated during the Chongqing Gang Crackdown.

description.zh-cn: 谢才萍是文强弟弟文兵的妻子，为文强的弟媳。
description.en: Xie Caiping is the wife of Wen Qiang's younger brother, Wen Bing, making her Wen Qiang's sister-in-law.

position.en: Deputy Chief of the Criminal Investigation Corps

description.zh-cn: 黄代强曾是文强在重庆市公安局的下属，后一同受审。
description.en: Huang Daiqiang was formerly Wen Qiang's subordinate at the Chongqing Municipal Public Security Bureau and was later tried in the same case.

position.en: Deputy Chief of the Economic Crime Investigation Corps

description.zh-cn: 赵利明曾是文强在重庆市公安局的下属，后一同受审。
description.en: Zhao Liming was formerly Wen Qiang's subordinate at the Chongqing Municipal Public Security Bureau and was later tried in the same case.

position.en: Deputy Chief of the Public Order Corps

description.zh-cn: 陈涛曾是文强在重庆市公安局的下属，后一同受审。
description.en: Chen Tao was formerly Wen Qiang's subordinate at the Chongqing Municipal Public Security Bureau and was later tried in the same case.

description.zh-cn: 2009年9月26日，文强和彭长健一同被警方执行逮捕。
description.en: On September 26, 2009, Wen Qiang and Peng Changjian were arrested by the police together.

relationships.source: 重庆市第五中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 一审以受贿罪、包庇纵容黑社会性质组织罪、巨额财产来源不明罪和强奸罪判处文强死刑。
description.en: In the first-instance trial, sentenced Wen Qiang to death for bribery, harboring and conniving with mafia-like organizations, possessing huge assets from unknown sources, and rape.

description.zh-cn: 二审驳回文强上诉，维持死刑原判。
description.en: In the second-instance trial, rejected Wen Qiang's appeal and upheld the original death sentence.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院

description.zh-cn: 核准并执行了文强的死刑。
description.en: Approved and carried out Wen Qiang's death sentence.
